Package AList

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • AList.Post
  • public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
    The Post class is a class that contains the postID, accountID, content, likes, and comments of a post

    • Constructor Summary

      Post​(int postID, int accountID, java.lang.String content)

        public void setLikes​(Like like,
                     int process,
                     int index)
        This function is used to add or remove a like from the likes array
        Parameters:
        like - the like object that is being added or removed
        process - 0 for adding a like, anything else for removing a like

      • setComments

                        int process,
                        int index)
        This function is used to add or remove comments from the comments array
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment object that is being added or removed
        process - 0 = add, anything else = remove
